verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician עַֽל־ <WH5921> and [יְדִיתוּן כ] (יְדוּת֗וּן <WH3038> Jeduthun ק) לְאָסָ֥ף <WH623> of Asaph מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <WH4210> A Psalm קוֹלִ֣י <WH6963> with my voice אֶל־ <WH413> to אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> unto God וְאֶצְעָ֑קָה <WH6817> I cried קוֹלִ֥י <WH6963> with my voice אֶל־ <WH413> to אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> [even] unto God וְהַאֲזִ֥ין <WH238> and he gave ear אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> in

בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> In the day צָרָתִי֮ <WH6869> of my trouble אֲדֹנָ֪י <WH136> the Lord דָּ֫רָ֥שְׁתִּי <WH1875> I sought יָדִ֤י ׀ <WH3027> my sore לַ֣יְלָה <WH3915> in the night נִ֭גְּרָה <WH5064> ran וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> without תָפ֑וּג <WH6313> and ceased מֵאֲנָ֖ה <WH3985> refused הִנָּחֵ֣ם <WH5162> to be comforted נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> not my soul

אֶזְכְּרָ֣ה <WH2142> I remembered אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> God וְאֶֽהֱמָיָ֑ה <WH1993> and was troubled אָשִׂ֓יחָה ׀ <WH7878> I complained וְתִתְעַטֵּ֖ף <WH5848> was overwhelmed רוּחִ֣י <WH7307> and my spirit סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah
אָ֭חַזְתָּ <WH270> Thou holdest שְׁמֻר֣וֹת <WH8109> waking עֵינָ֑י <WH5869> mine eyes נִ֝פְעַ֗מְתִּי <WH6470> I am so troubled וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot אֲדַבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> that I cannot speak
חִשַּׁ֣בְתִּי <WH2803> I have considered יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> the days מִקֶּ֑דֶם <WH6924> of old שְׁ֝נ֗וֹת <WH8141> the years עוֹלָמִֽים׃ <WH5769> of ancient times

אֶֽזְכְּרָ֥ה <WH2142> I call to remembrance נְגִינָתִ֗י <WH5058> my song בַּ֫לָּ֥יְלָה <WH3915> in the night עִם־ <WH5973> with לְבָבִ֥י <WH3824> with mine own heart אָשִׂ֑יחָה <WH7878> I commune וַיְחַפֵּ֥שׂ <WH2664> made diligent search רוּחִֽי׃ <WH7307> and my spirit
הַֽ֭לְעוֹלָמִים <WH5769> alway יִזְנַ֥ח ׀ <WH2186> cast off אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> Will the Lord וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יֹסִ֖יף <WH3254> add לִרְצ֣וֹת <WH7521> he be favourable עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> again
הֶאָפֵ֣ס <WH656> clean gone לָנֶ֣צַח <WH5331> alway חַסְדּ֑וֹ <WH2617> Is his mercy גָּ֥מַר <WH1584> fail אֹ֝֗מֶר <WH562> promise לְדֹ֣ר <WH1755> age וָדֹֽר׃ <WH1755> age

הֲשָׁכַ֣ח <WH7911> forgotten חַנּ֣וֹת <WH2589> to be gracious אֵ֑ל <WH410> Hath God אִם־ <WH518> Or קָפַ֥ץ <WH7092> shut up בְּ֝אַ֗ף <WH639> ? hath he in anger רַחֲמָ֥יו <WH7356> tender love סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

וָ֭אֹמַר <WH559> And I said חַלּ֣וֹתִי <WH2470> This [is] my infirmity הִ֑יא <WH1931> I שְׁ֝נ֗וֹת <WH8141> [but I will remember] the years יְמִ֣ין <WH3225> of the right hand עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <WH5945> of the most High

[אַזְכִּיר כ] (אֶזְכֹּ֥ור <WH2142> shall remember ק) מַֽעַלְלֵי־ <WH4611> the works יָ֑הּ <WH3050> of the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Surely אֶזְכְּרָ֖ה <WH2142> surely I will remember מִקֶּ֣דֶם <WH6924> of old פִּלְאֶֽךָ׃ <WH6382> thy wonders
וְהָגִ֥יתִי <WH1897> I will meditate בְכָל־ <WH3605> all פָּעֳלֶ֑ךָ <WH6467> also of all thy work וּֽבַעֲלִ֖ילוֹתֶ֣יךָ <WH5949> of thy doings אָשִֽׂיחָה׃ <WH7878> and talk
אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> O God בַּקֹּ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> [is] in the sanctuary דַּרְכֶּ֑ךָ <WH1870> Thy way מִי־ <WH4310> What אֵ֥ל <WH410> a God גָּ֝ד֗וֹל <WH1419> who [is so] great כֵּֽאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> God

אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You הָ֭אֵל <WH410> Thou [art] the God עֹ֣שֵׂה <WH6213> that doest פֶ֑לֶא <WH6382> wonders הוֹדַ֖עְתָּ <WH3045> thou hast declared בָעַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> among the people עֻזֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5797> thy strength

גָּאַ֣לְתָּ <WH1350> redeemed בִּזְר֣וֹעַ <WH2220> Thou hast with [thine] arm עַמֶּ֑ךָ <WH5971> thy people בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the sons יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> of Jacob וְיוֹסֵ֣ף <WH3130> and Joseph סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

רָ֘א֤וּךָ <WH7200> saw מַּ֨יִם ׀ <WH4325> The waters אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> thee O God רָא֣וּךָ <WH7200> saw מַּ֣יִם <WH4325> the waters יָחִ֑ילוּ <WH2342> thee they were afraid אַ֝֗ף <WH637> also יִרְגְּז֥וּ <WH7264> also were troubled תְהֹמֽוֹת׃ <WH8415> the depths

זֹ֤רְמוּ <WH2229> poured out מַ֨יִם ׀ <WH4325> water עָב֗וֹת <WH5645> The clouds ק֭וֹל <WH6963> a sound נָתְנ֣וּ <WH5414> sent out שְׁחָקִ֑ים <WH7834> the skies אַף־ <WH637> yet חֲ֝צָצֶ֗יךָ <WH2687> thine arrows יִתְהַלָּֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> also went abroad

ק֤וֹל <WH6963> The voice רַעַמְךָ֨ ׀ <WH7482> of thy thunder בַּגַּלְגַּ֗ל <WH1534> [was] in the heaven הֵאִ֣ירוּ <WH215> lightened בְרָקִ֣ים <WH1300> the lightnings תֵּבֵ֑ל <WH8398> the world רָגְזָ֖ה <WH7264> trembled וַתִּרְעַ֣שׁ <WH7493> and shook הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth

בַּיָּ֤ם <WH3220> [is] in the sea דַּרְכֶּ֗ךָ <WH1870> Thy way [וּשְׁבִילֶיךָ כ] (וּֽ֭שְׁבִֽילְךָ <WH7635> path ק) בְּמַ֣יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> in the great וְ֝עִקְּבוֹתֶ֗יךָ <WH6119> and thy footsteps לֹ֣א <WH3808> not נֹדָֽעוּ׃ <WH3045> are not known
נָחִ֣יתָ <WH5148> Thou leddest כַצֹּ֣אן <WH6629> like a flock עַמֶּ֑ךָ <WH5971> thy people בְּֽיַד־ <WH3027> by the hand מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> of Moses וְאַהֲרֹֽן׃ <WH175> and Aaron
